data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guerra-García, José M., Tato, Ramiro, Moreira, Juan (2018): Caprellidae (Crustacea: Peracarida: Amphipoda) from deep-sea waters off Galicia (NW Iberian Peninsula) with the description of a new genus and three new species. Zootaxa 4532 (2): 151-202, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4532.2.1|23 occurrences
